Text:
Great stuff! Asian Vacation is a surprising name for this video, since it?s about people going on vacation in Mexico. What is Asian about it is that the women in the group are all Asian.

There is a lot of real sight-seeing footage, with the guys and girls seeing the sites in Mexico. This is fun because it looks like standard vacation video, with people talking into the camera about how crummy the hotel is, how great the view is, etc. They all go parasailing, which looks really fun. 

The sex is in semi-public settings, like on a boat in the harbor. The women are beautiful and the sex is good. The girls are especially good at swallowing big cocks. (No anal)

The video and audio quality are excellent.
